mapper.select: /* AdmRtrcnPrcndMapper.selectRtrcnPrcndList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmRtrcnPrcndMapper.selectBizSrhList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmRtrcnPrcndMapper.selectRtrcnPrcndHistList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* AdmRtrcnPrcndMapper.selectRtrcnPrcndExcel */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
